item.description:

item.description:

This speed is about a millisecond per 186 miles in a vacuum and increases with copper or fiber cables, further compounded by routers and switches. Being directly connected to your provider minimizes this distance. Telx offers a solution. Telx specializes in colocation, connecting customers and providers physically.
